intro: Oreorhamnus, commonly known as the mountain buckthorn, is a genus of flowering plants in the family Rhamnaceae. These shrubs are characterized by their small, often spiny leaves and clusters of small, yellowish flowers. They are often found in rocky or dry habitats, showcasing their adaptability to harsh environments.
